messages.title: WHAT THIS ELECTION IS ABOUT
messages.content: Strong and stable leadership in the national interest with Theresa May and the Conservatives - or weak and unstable coalition government led by Jeremy Corbyn.

messages.title: STRONG AND STABLE LEADERSHIP IN THE NATIONAL INTEREST
messages.content: Every vote cast for Theresa May and the Conservatives will strengthen Britain's hand in the Brexit negotiations.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Establish Britain as the strongest country in Europe, in economic growth and national security.

issues.brexitEurope: Establish Britain as the strongest country in Europe, in economic growth and national security. A stronger economy that rewards people who work hard and creates secure well-paid jobs. Work to get the best deal for Britain taking back control over our laws, money and borders.
issues.economy: A stronger economy that rewards people who work hard and creates secure well-paid jobs.
issues.education: There is a good school place for every child.
issues.health: Increase the National Health Service budget every year and ensure mental health is given the same priority as physical health.
issues.immigration: Take back control over our laws, money and borders.
